channel.title: AllstarUria 317!
channel.description:
Welcome to Allstar-Uria,
server Made by ;
-Digiimajor -rush n Skill
Server Hosted By;
-Digiimajor
Forum made by ;
-Rush n Skill
Updates Being Done:
-A 100% Anti-nuller. -Full Working Lottery system ! -100% Working Clanchat! -100% Working double xp calculator ! -1B Exchange Tickets -Epic Bosses -Combat Xp Changed -Text colours -Random Coins Update (on skills) -Random box (on skills) -Torva (can get by KBD) -A lot Random Items ! -Spirit Shield (Can get by KBD) -Own working Client ! -Updating Clanwars soon! -And many many more . -More than 60 Player Titles ! -We will have soon a Forum !
**CLIENT LINK**
http://uppit.com/a0yo6cw1rc7u/AllstarUria_client_V1.1.rar
http://up.ht/164G4lw
**FORUM LINK**
http://w11.zetaboards.com/Allstar_Uria_Forums/index/
**PICTURES**
Working client Colours!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/344f2w2.png[/img]
Random thieving!
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/4scsbk.png[/img]
Full working Lottery system!
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/wrcj1t.png[/img]
Working Clanchat!
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/1t8w47.png[/img]
100% Working PlayerTitles!
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/25fj8ec.png[/img]
Epic Bossing!
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2e4w13a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ymjcw5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/4qo1lf.png[/img]
Random Items !
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/24kyrf4.png[/img]
we hope you enjoy the server!

item.title: AllstarUria 317!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Si Force:

I have removed all of the spam and flame. Keep it clean from here guys. If you have nothing positive to contribute to the thread, don’t post at all.

Looks like we were working together, I removed 25 posts in total from it lol. OT: most of this useless spam could’ve been taken to PM or not be enlarged by people jumping in the bandwagon. Keep it to yourselves if all you’re going to do is derail threads.

Read full topic

item.title: AllstarUria 317!
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“Phail3d, post:12, topic:519776”]I really like what you’ve done here. Great original ideas like Nechyrael as boss. I honestly would have never thought of that. Oh, and that forum skin? It looks awesome! I’ve never seen it anywhere before. I’m actually considering joining myself; I like what I see.

I forgot to mention how I love that the rules are very thorough. Alot of thought was put into it. I respect that.[/quote]
Obviously not Phail that co-owns FS with Iceman…so i’m guessing this isn’t a troll but it sure as hell sounds like one… none of the features in this server are original

Read full topic

item.title: AllstarUria 317!
item.dc:creator: @Phail3d Phail3d
item.description:
@Phail3d wrote:

I really like what you’ve done here. Great original ideas like Nechyrael as boss. I honestly would have never thought of that. Oh, and that forum skin? It looks awesome! I’ve never seen it anywhere before. I’m actually considering joining myself; I like what I see.

I forgot to mention how I love that the rules are very thorough. Alot of thought was put into it. I respect that.

Read full topic
